<rule id="springboot-plugins-to-quarkus-0000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <xmlfile in="pom.xml" matches="/m:project/m:build/m:plugins/m:plugin[m:artifactId = 'spring-boot-maven-plugin']">
                    <namespace prefix="m" uri="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"/>
                </xmlfile>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the spring-boot-maven-plugin dependency">
                    <message>
                        Replace the `spring-boot-maven-plugin` dependency.
                        The `spring-boot-maven-plugin` dependency needs to be replaced with `quarkus-maven-plugin`, so that the application is built with Quarkus, both for running on the JVM and in native mode.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/maven-tooling#build-tool-maven" title="Building Quarkus with maven"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
